name: GameObjectIDStackSize
description: Show an object's ID in its lower right corner.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description:
Toggles the mod.

<cy>To hide the "notification"</c> <cr>everywhere</c><cy>, disable this setting.</c>

stackSizeFont.name: Stack Size Font
stackSizeFont.description:
Choose the font for the stack size text.

<cj>0 for Pusab, -1 for Golden Pusab, and -2 for the font you see when viewing level comments.</c>
<cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

scale.name: Stack Size Scale
scale.description: Adjust the scale of the stack size text.

padding.name: Stack Size Padding
padding.description: Adjust the amount of padding for positioning the stack size text.
